item.title: EndgameRadio Prime: Episode 200!
item.dc:creator: Tom Mannino
item.description: Download the MP3 Aaron and Tom are back after more then a year-long hiatus! They recap what they’ve been up to for the past year, what they are up to now, and what the plans are for the future of EGR! Come catch up!

item.title: EndgameRadio Prime: Episode 199
item.dc:creator: Tom Mannino
item.description: Download the MP3 This week we go over some heavy-hitters. Team Fortress 2 had the new content release, as well as the medic unlocks, but made a booboo; somehow they allowed the achievements to be unlocked via typing codes in the console. GTA 4 is out, but we haven’t played it because we’re not [...]

item.title: EndgameRadio Prime: Episode 197
item.dc:creator: Tom Mannino
item.description: Download the MP3 TF2 teaches us some awesome things about unlocks and achievements. The medic has a lot of new toys to play with and a lot of hoops to jump through. item.title: EndgameRadio Prime: Episode 193
item.dc:creator: Tom Mannino
item.description: Download the MP3 This week we brawled, and all of the cool concepts the game has introduced, especially a prefabricated tournament system. No more Heroes cool wiimote/phone concepts, Wii stuff, fighting game stuff, and we touch upon a few other current events.

item.title: EndgameRadio Prime: Episode 192
item.dc:creator: Tom Mannino
item.description: Download the MP3 This week on EndgameRadio Prime, we take a walk down the catwalk because we are supermodels. item.title: EndgameRadio Prime: Episode 191
item.dc:creator: Tom Mannino
item.description: Download the MP3 This week we have a huge GDC rundown/wrapup, and talk about Persona 3: FES, Portal 2, and EALand. We cover our rundown of personalities, pursuits, and parties. Also Penis and Spore and You. Relevant.
